title: Run Gnome on Wayland

title: Fix Video Tearing in Gnome With Intel iGPU
snippet: Edit /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/20-intel.conf$ vim /etc/X11/xorg.conf.d/20-intel.confSet the tear free option:Section "OutputClass" Identifier "Intel Graphics" MatchDriver "i915" Driver "intel" Option "TearFree" "true" # This line does th...

title: Speed up Arch Linux AUR Building
snippet: Edit /etc/makepkg.conf$ vim /etc/makepkg.confParallel compilation:MAKEFLAGS="-j$(nproc)"Parallel compression:COMPRESSXZ=(xz -c -z - --threads=0) # 0 for as many cores as possibleCOMPRESSGZ=(pigz -c -f -n)COMPRESSBZ2=(pbzip2 -c -f)Completely disable compression:PKGEXT=".pkg.tar&quot...
